summary: AN ORDINANCE authorizing an agreement with the National League of Cities/United States Conference of Mayors, Inc., for financial assistance for the continuation of the Veterans Action Center Program for the period August 1, 1974, through October 31, 1974; increasing certain Objects of Expenditure in the 1974 Budget of the Department of Human Resources in connection therewith, making a reimbursable appropriation from the Emergency Fund and declaring the emergency therefor.
